simplesect.para: Reference to the allocated instance state.

briefdescription.para: Get the client ID of an IRMP decoder core instance.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to block until the lock is acquired.

briefdescription.para: Query the IRMP library's configured sample rate.

detaileddescription.para: The internally used sample rate is a compile time option. Any data that is provided at runtime needs to match this rate, or detection will fail.
This must be called before data processing starts.

briefdescription.para: Feed an individual sample to the detector.

detaileddescription.para: See irmp_get_result_data() for result retrieval when detection of an IR frame completes. Make sure irmp_reset_state() was called before providing the first sample.

parameterdescription.para: The pin value to feed to the detector.

simplesect.para: Non-zero when an IR frame was detected.

briefdescription.para: Query result data after detection succeeded.

simplesect.para: Non-zero if data was available, zero otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Resolve the protocol identifer to the protocol's name.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the string literal, or NULL in case of failure.
